    func encryptCBC(simpletext string, key, iv string) (string, error) {
        h := md5.New()
        h.Write([]byte(key))
        cbcKey := h.Sum(nil) // aes_key = md5(DeviceKey) æ³¨æ„éƒ½æ˜¯byteæ•°ç»„ï¼Œé•¿åº¦æ˜¯16ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚

        h.Reset()
        h.Write([]byte(iv))
        cbcIV := h.Sum(nil) //è®¡ç®—aes_iv= md5(DeviceSeedPrefix_Timestamp) æ³¨æ„éƒ½æ˜¯byteæ•°ç»„ï¼Œé•¿åº¦æ˜¯16ä¸ªå­—èŠ‚

        block, err := aes.NewCipher(cbcKey)
        if err != nil {
            return "", err
        }
    
        blockSize := block.BlockSize()
        originData := pkcs5Pad(stringtobytes(simpletext), blockSize)
        blockMode := cipher.NewCBCEncrypter(block, cbcIV)
        crypted := make([]byte, len(originData))
        blockMode.CryptBlocks(crypted, originData)
        return strings.ToUpper(hex.EncodeToString(crypted)), nil // è¿”å›çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç›´æ¥ä»byteæ•°ç»„å¾—åˆ° å¦‚0xA1,0x45,0xB5å˜æˆA145B5å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

    // encryptCBC javaè¯­è¨€ç‰ˆæœ¬åŠ å¯†ç¤ºä¾‹ 
    // encryptCBC("12345678__2111041255122295813791744__20211104__1635955495__1__0__1", "DVGvnShHp!=EaLRKBRK", "B6941F2A3360393DB0A_1560243573")
     public static String encryptCBC(String simpleText, String key, String iv) throws Exception {
        MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");

        md.update(key.getBytes());
        byte[] cbcKey = md.digest();

        md.reset();
        md.update(iv.getBytes());
        byte[] cbcIV = md.digest();

        Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        SecretKeySpec secretKeySpec = new SecretKeySpec(cbcKey, "AES");
        IvParameterSpec ivParameterSpec = new IvParameterSpec(cbcIV);
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, secretKeySpec, ivParameterSpec);

        byte[] encrypted = cipher.doFinal(simpleText.getBytes());

        return bytesToHex(encrypted).toUpperCase();
    }

    private static String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes) {
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
        for (byte b : bytes) {
            sb.append(String.format("%02X", b));
        }
        return sb.toString();
    }

import (
	"context"
	"github.com/larksuite/oapi-sdk-go/v3"
	"github.com/larksuite/oapi-sdk-go/v3/service/contact/v3"
)
func main() {
	// åˆ›å»º Client
	client := lark.NewClient("appID", "appSecret")
	// åˆ›å»ºè¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡
	req := larkcontact.NewBatchGetIdUserReqBuilder().
		UserIdType(`open_id`).
		Body(larkcontact.NewBatchGetIdUserReqBodyBuilder().
			Emails([]string{`zhangsan@z.com`, `lisi@a.com`}).
			Mobiles([]string{`13812345678`, `13812345679`}).
			Build()).
		Build()
	// å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚
	resp, err := client.Contact.User.BatchGetId(context.Background(), req)
}

import com.lark.oapi.Client;
import com.lark.oapi.core.request.RequestOptions;

import com.lark.oapi.service.contact.v3.model.BatchGetIdUserReqBody;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String arg[]) throws Exception {
        // æ„å»ºclient
        Client client = Client.newBuilder("appId", "appSecret").build();
        // åˆ›å»ºè¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡
        BatchGetIdUserReq req = BatchGetIdUserReq.newBuilder()
                .userIdType("open_id")

                        .emails(new String[]{"zhangsan@z.com", "lisi@a.com"})

                        .build())
                .build();
        // å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚
        BatchGetIdUserResp resp = client.contact().user().batchGetId(req, RequestOptions.newBuilder().build());
    }
}
